experience.title: Visiting Student Program(VSP)
experience.description: Development and characterization of optical site profiler for 3.6m Devasthal Optical telescope.Development and validation of the opto-electro-mechanical system for the instrument which involves.a. Design and analysis of optics in Zemax, design of opto-mechanical setup, integration of CMOS detectors.b. Development of prototype setup in the laboratory and performing experiments to verify the performance.c. Characterize the instrument performance using lab sources and phase screens.d. Interface with the software team to integrate the instrument with acquisition and profiling software.

Development of prototype setup in the laboratory and performing experiments to verify the performance.c. Characterize the instrument performance using lab sources and phase screens.d. Interface with the software team to integrate the instrument with acquisition and profiling software.
